delete.title: Delete Pool
delete.warning: This will remove all metadata related to the pool and may affect tasks using this pool.

form.checkbox: Check to include deferred tasks when calculating open pool slots
form.name: Name
form.nameMaxLength: Name can contain a maximum of 256 characters

overwrite.description: Overwrites the variable in case of a conflict.

skip.description: Skips importing variables that already exist.
